name: CAPITOL HILL CONSULTING GROUP ON BEHALF BLACKWATER DIVING LLC
sampleDescriptions: Diving Services related to oil and gas production in the Gulf of Mexico;  Resolution of a fine, imposed by the Coast Guard.

Research and preparation for the making of contacts to resolve a fine that was imposed by the Coast Guard for a delay in certification of routine inspection due to operational and competing contractua
